data.title: AVS, the Science and Technology Society Fellow
data.meta_description: The AVS Science and Technology Society Fellowship is awarded to an individual in recognition of their significant achievements in and contributions to areas of interest to AVS.
data.text:
Awarded by

American Vacuum Society (Science and Technology of Materials, Interfaces, and Processing)

The AVS Science and Technology Society Fellowship is awarded to an individual in recognition of their significant achievements in and contributions to areas of interest to AVS.
